modName: Glass Armor Set - Light Crystal Blue
summary: Armor set to match my previously made glass shield.
descriptionHtml:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
~Description:~
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Well here it is the glass armor set to match my glass shield i made few days ago.

~~~~~~~~~~
~Install:~
~~~~~~~~~~

Extract RAR file & put textures folder inside your Skyrim/Data folder.

~~~~~~~~~~~
~Unistall:~
~~~~~~~~~~~

Delete files.

~~~~~~~~~~~~
~Extra Info~
~~~~~~~~~~~~

You can get the shield from the screenshots from here http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=531
author: Snezko
